attributes.action: Ensure fair treatment of pre-pay energy users.
attributes.additional_details:
Evidence:
- number of pre-pay energy customers 2013: http://zerocarbonista.com/2013/12/05/the-pre-payment-meter-rip-off/ 
- over-charging: http://zerocarbonista.com/2013/12/05/the-pre-payment-meter-rip-off/
-  70% debt payback on a meter: https://medium.com/@binreminded/fuel-poverty-b49b293b0cc3#.us4if095h
attributes.background: There are over 3 to 4 million pre-pay energy customers. Most owe money to an energy provider. Each pays about £226 more for energy than a standard tariff user and are forced to pay back their debt at an extortionate rate - in many cases 70% is taken for debt from energy purchases.
